titleStmt.title: A second, but more perfect relation of the great victory obtained by Sir Ralph Hopton neare Bodmin, in the county of Cornwall, on thursday Ian. 19. ann. Dom. 1642. Together with his no lesse eminent successe at Saltash, the Sunday following being the 22th.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.
Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662. True and briefe relation of the great victory obtained by Sir Ralph Hopton.
T. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hall for VV. VVebb,

notesStmt.note: Place of printing from Madan; year of publication given according to Lady Day dating.
A revised version of: Heylyn, Peter. A true and briefe relation of the great victory obtained by Sir Ralph Hopton.
Includes a letter on p.4 signed: T.B.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
